name: Att's Assault (7DRL Challenge Entry)
description:
Keypad controls require having numlock on!

Gameplay controls:

Movement: Keypad 1-9, or WASD

Pull up Menu: Keypad 0 or Esc

Go down stairs: Keypad + or F

Basic attack/ Attack with weapon: Spacebar

Instructions:

Survive 20 floors of Att's Assault. Find the ladder on every floor to advance to the next floor. Use special moves and inventory items from the main menu (Esc or Keypad 0). Do you have what it takes to survive?
